title: Something’s Burning - Kevin Clancy & John Feitelberg Make a KFC Casserole
itunes:title: Something’s Burning - Kevin Clancy & John Feitelberg Make a KFC Casserole
description:
KFC Radio Hosts Kevin Clancy & John Feitelberg drink and watch me make a KFC casserole.

 

KFC Radio

YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCS7DF7CP_bOyZ2T1c1Uoz9g 

 

Follow Kevin

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/kfcbarstool 

Twitter: https://twitter.com/kfcbarstool 

 

Follow John

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/feitelberg 

Twitter: https://twitter.com/FeitsBarstool 

 

Get Season 1 of Something’s Burning AND brand new merch at https://bertyboyproductions.com/somethings-burning  

 

KFC Casserole

 

INGREDIENTS

KFC mashed potatoes

KFC mac and cheese

corn (not frozen)

Homemade KFC chicken tenders 

Homemade gravy

Shredded Cheddar cheese

KFC biscuits

 

Steps

  • In a casserole dish, layer:
    • Mashed potatoes
    • Corn
    • Mac and Cheese
    • Chicken; cubed
    • Shredded cheese
  • Bake in the oven for 20-30 min at 400°
  • Pull out of the oven and drizzle gravy on top
  • Serve with a KFC biscuit on the side
